languages.text:
Deals weapon damage with weapon pentration in 1 cell radius around casterm and double damage with double penetration to caster.
Removes all stacks of {g|f:0835dbc012334dd49f849fcc92e9f708}Overheated Plasma{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Deals weapon damage with weapon pentration in 1 cell radius around casterm and double damage with double penetration to caster.
Removes all stacks of {g|f:0835dbc012334dd49f849fcc92e9f708}Overheated Plasma{/g}.

languages.text:
Each creature in a 1-cell radius around the wielder suffers {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}energy damage{/g} equal to the plasma weapon damage, using that weapon's {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}. The wielder suffers two times the damage with two times the armour penetration.
When the explosion occurs, all stacks of {g|f:0835dbc012334dd49f849fcc92e9f708}plasma cell overheating{/g} are removed from the wielder.

traits.locale_text:
Each creature in a 1-cell radius around the wielder suffers {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}energy damage{/g} equal to the plasma weapon damage with that weapon's {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}. The wielder suffers twice more damage with twice increased armour penetration.
When the explosion occurs, all stacks of {g|f:0835dbc012334dd49f849fcc92e9f708}plasma cell overheat{/g} are removed from the wielder.

Each creature in a 1-cell radius around the wielder suffers {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}energy damage{/g} equal to the plasma weapon damage, using that weapon's {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}. The wielder suffers two times the damage with two times the armour penetration.
When the explosion occurs, all stacks of {g|f:0835dbc012334dd49f849fcc92e9f708}plasma cell overheating{/g} are removed from the wielder.

Each creature in a 1-cell radius around the wielder suffers {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}energy damage{/g} equal to the plasma weapon damage, using that weapon's {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}. The wielder suffers two times the damage with two times the armour penetration.
When the explosion occurs, all stacks of {g|f:0835dbc012334dd49f849fcc92e9f708}plasma cell overheating{/g} are removed from the wielder.

languages.text:
Каждое существо в радиусе 1 клетки от персонажа получает {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}энергетический урон{/g}, равный урону от плазменного оружия с его обычным {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}пробитием брони{/g}. Сам персонаж получает в два раза больше урона с удвоенным пробитием брони.
При взрыве с персонажа снимаются все уровни {g|f:0835dbc012334dd49f849fcc92e9f708}перегрева плазмокамеры{/g}.
languages.original_text:
Each creature in a 1-cell radius around the wielder suffers {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}energy damage{/g} equal to the plasma weapon damage with that weapon's {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}. The wielder suffers twice more damage with twice increased armour penetration.
When the explosion occurs, all stacks of {g|f:0835dbc012334dd49f849fcc92e9f708}plasma cell overheat{/g} are removed from the wielder.

traits.locale_text:
Каждое существо в радиусе 1 клетки от персонажа получает {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}энергетический урон{/g}, равный урону от плазменного оружия с его обычным {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}пробитием брони{/g}. Сам персонаж получает в два раза больше урона с удвоенным пробитием брони.
При взрыве с персонажа снимаются все уровни {g|f:0835dbc012334dd49f849fcc92e9f708}перегрева плазмокамеры{/g}.

Каждое существо в радиусе 1 клетки от персонажа получает {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}энергетический урон{/g}, равный урону от плазменного оружия с его обычным {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}пробитием брони{/g}. Сам персонаж получает в два раза больше урона с удвоенным пробитием брони.
При взрыве с персонажа снимаются все уровни {g|f:0835dbc012334dd49f849fcc92e9f708}перегрева плазмокамеры{/g}.

languages.text:
使用者の周囲1セル半径内のすべての生物は、その武器の{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}アーマー貫通/g}を用いて、プラズマ武器のダメージに等しい{g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}エネルギーダメージ{/g}を受ける。
使用者自身は、その2倍のダメージと2倍のーマー貫通を受ける。
爆発が発生すると、使用者の{g|f:0835dbc012334dd49f849fcc92e9f708}プラズマセル過熱{/g}のスタックはすべて解除される。
languages.original_text:
Each creature in a 1-cell radius around the wielder suffers {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}energy damage{/g} equal to the plasma weapon damage, using that weapon's {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}. The wielder suffers two times the damage with two times the armour penetration.
When the explosion occurs, all stacks of {g|f:0835dbc012334dd49f849fcc92e9f708}plasma cell overheating{/g} are removed from the wielder.

traits.locale_text:
使用者の周囲1セル半径内のすべての生き物は、その武器の{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}アーマー貫通/g}を用いて、プラズマ武器のダメージに等しい{g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}エネルギーダメージ{/g}を受ける。
使用者自身は、その2倍のダメージと2倍のーマー貫通を受ける。
爆発が発生すると、使用者の{g|f:0835dbc012334dd49f849fcc92e9f708}プラズマセル過熱{/g}のスタックはすべて解除される。

languages.text:
Jede Kreatur in einem Radius von 1 Feld um den Träger erleidet {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}Energieschaden{/g} in Höhe des Schadens der Plasmawaffe basierend auf der {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}Rüstungsdurchdringung{/g} der Waffe. Der Träger erleidet den zweifachen Schaden mit der zweifachen Rüstungsdurchdringung.
Zum Zeitpunkt der Explosion werden alle {g|f:0835dbc012334dd49f849fcc92e9f708}Plasmazellen-Überhitzung{/g}-Stapel des Trägers entfernt.
languages.original_text:
Each creature in a 1-cell radius around the wielder suffers {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}energy damage{/g} equal to the plasma weapon damage, using that weapon's {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}. The wielder suffers two times the damage with two times the armour penetration.
When the explosion occurs, all stacks of {g|f:0835dbc012334dd49f849fcc92e9f708}plasma cell overheating{/g} are removed from the wielder.

traits.locale_text:
Jede Kreatur in einem Radius von 1 Feld um den Träger erleidet {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}Energieschaden{/g} in Höhe des Schadens der Plasmawaffe basierend auf der {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}Rüstungsdurchdringung{/g} der Waffe. Der Träger erleidet den zweifachen Schaden mit der zweifachen Rüstungsdurchdringung.
Zum Zeitpunkt der Explosion werden alle {g|f:0835dbc012334dd49f849fcc92e9f708}Plasmazellen-Überhitzung{/g}-Stapel des Trägers entfernt.

languages.text:
Toda criatura en un radio de 1 casilla del portador sufre {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}daño elemental{/g} igual al daño del arma de plasma, usando la {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}penetración de armadura{/g} de la misma. El portador sufre el doble de daño con doble de penetración de armadura.
Al producirse la explosión, se eliminan todas las acumulaciones de {g|f:0835dbc012334dd49f849fcc92e9f708}Sobrecalentamiento de células de plasma{/g} del portador.
languages.original_text:
Each creature in a 1-cell radius around the wielder suffers {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}energy damage{/g} equal to the plasma weapon damage, using that weapon's {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}. The wielder suffers two times the damage with two times the armour penetration.
When the explosion occurs, all stacks of {g|f:0835dbc012334dd49f849fcc92e9f708}plasma cell overheating{/g} are removed from the wielder.

traits.locale_text:
Toda criatura en un radio de 1 casilla del portador sufre {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}daño elemental{/g} igual al daño del arma de plasma, usando la {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}penetración de armadura{/g} de la misma. El portador sufre el doble de daño con doble de penetración de armadura.
Al producirse la explosión, se eliminan todas las acumulaciones de {g|f:0835dbc012334dd49f849fcc92e9f708}Sobrecalentamiento de células de plasma{/g} del portador.

languages.text:
装备者周围1格内的所有生物都会受到{g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}能量伤害{/g}，等同于等离子武器本身的伤害，此次伤害的{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}护甲穿透{/g}与等离子武器的护甲穿透相同。装备者承受双倍伤害与双倍护甲穿透。
爆炸发生后，装备者身上所有{g|f:0835dbc012334dd49f849fcc92e9f708}等离子电池过热{/g}层数都会移除。
languages.original_text:
Each creature in a 1-cell radius around the wielder suffers {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}energy damage{/g} equal to the plasma weapon damage, using that weapon's {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}. The wielder suffers two times the damage with two times the armour penetration.
When the explosion occurs, all stacks of {g|f:0835dbc012334dd49f849fcc92e9f708}plasma cell overheating{/g} are removed from the wielder.

traits.locale_text:
装备者周围1格内的所有生物都会受到{g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}能量伤害{/g}，等同于等离子武器本身的伤害，此次伤害的{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}护甲穿透{/g}与等离子武器的护甲穿透相同。装备者承受双倍伤害与双倍护甲穿透。
爆炸发生后，装备者身上所有{g|f:0835dbc012334dd49f849fcc92e9f708}等离子电池过热{/g}层数都会移除。

languages.text:
Toutes les créatures dans un rayon de 1 case autour de l'utilisateur subissent un montant de {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}dégâts d'énergie{/g} égal aux dégâts de l'arme à plasma, avec la même {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}pénétration d'armure{/g}. L'utilisateur subit le double de dégâts avec une pénétration d'armure multipliée par deux.
Quand l'explosion se produit, tous ses cumuls de {g|f:0835dbc012334dd49f849fcc92e9f708}Cellule de plasma en surchauffe{/g} sont supprimés.
languages.original_text:
Each creature in a 1-cell radius around the wielder suffers {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}energy damage{/g} equal to the plasma weapon damage, using that weapon's {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}. The wielder suffers two times the damage with two times the armour penetration.
When the explosion occurs, all stacks of {g|f:0835dbc012334dd49f849fcc92e9f708}plasma cell overheating{/g} are removed from the wielder.

traits.locale_text:
Toutes les créatures dans un rayon de 1 case autour de l'utilisateur subissent un montant de {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}dégâts d'énergie{/g} égal aux dégâts de l'arme à plasma, avec la même {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}pénétration d'armure{/g}. L'utilisateur subit le double de dégâts avec une pénétration d'armure multipliée par deux.
Quand l'explosion se produit, tous ses cumuls de {g|f:0835dbc012334dd49f849fcc92e9f708}Cellule de plasma en surchauffe{/g} sont supprimés.

languages.text:
Kullanan kişinin etrafındaki 1 hücrelik yarıçap içinde bulunan tüm yaratıklar; plazma silahının {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}zırh delme{/g} değerini kullanarak, bu silahın verdiği hasara eşit miktarda {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}enerji hasarı{/g} alır. Kullanan kişi, iki katı zırh delme değeri ile iki katı hasara maruz kalır.
Patlama gerçekleştiğinde, kullanan kişi üzerindeki tüm {g|f:0835dbc012334dd49f849fcc92e9f708}plazma hücresi aşırı ısınması{/g} birikimi ortadan kalkar.
languages.original_text:
Each creature in a 1-cell radius around the wielder suffers {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}energy damage{/g} equal to the plasma weapon damage, using that weapon's {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}. The wielder suffers two times the damage with two times the armour penetration.
When the explosion occurs, all stacks of {g|f:0835dbc012334dd49f849fcc92e9f708}plasma cell overheating{/g} are removed from the wielder.

traits.locale_text:
Kullanan kişinin etrafındaki 1 hücrelik yarıçap içinde bulunan tüm yaratıklar; plazma silahının {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}zırh delme{/g} değerini kullanarak, bu silahın verdiği hasara eşit miktarda {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}enerji hasarı{/g} alır. Kullanan kişi, iki katı zırh delme değeri ile iki katı hasara maruz kalır.
Patlama gerçekleştiğinde, kullanan kişi üzerindeki tüm {g|f:0835dbc012334dd49f849fcc92e9f708}plazma hücresi aşırı ısınması{/g} birikimi ortadan kalkar.
